channel.title: [pi] how to make a certain player unable to stake in duel arena?

item.title: [pi] how to make a certain player unable to stake in duel arena?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:


[code=java]             		if (c.playerRights >= 3) {
		c.sendMessage("You can't stake as co owner..");
		return false;
		}[/code]

if (c.playerRights >= 3) { c.sendMessage("You can't stake as co owner.."); return false; }

item.title: [pi] how to make a certain player unable to stake in duel arena?
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

Hey guys, I was wondering if anyone knows how to make it so that certain players cant stake?
This is a code i used for trade and drop

			if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the players name")) {
		c.sendMessage("You Are not aloud to drop items.");
		return;
		}

Im not sure were to put it for staking :S any help is appreciated
